item.title: Setting up a hugo site
item.description: This is the first blog of this page. So i’ve decided to make the first one about setting up hugo to be honest it required me tinkering a little but but it should be easy for the most of us, This was made as an experiment to see if the blogging would be a good lifestyle Installing hugo pacman -S hugo Themes So here when it comes to themes just go to the hugo’s theme page and pick a theme after that execute this command
